dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5679 IH: Termination of Reckless Unchecked Mandates from this President Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Craig introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funds from being obligated or expended to promulgate Executive orders during a lapse in discretionary appropriations.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Termination of Reckless Unchecked Mandates from this President Act or the TRUMP Act.

section.header: Limitation on Executive orders during lapse in appropriations
section.text: During any period of a lapse in discretionary appropriations beginning on or after the date of the enactment of this Act, no Federal funds may be obligated or expended to promulgate or issue any Executive order or presidential memorandum.
